resources.string:
This app tries to cut back space occupied by the Google Music app.

This app needs root access!

Copyright 2014 - Felix Bechstein
License: Apache 2.0
Source code: https://github.com/felixb/google-music-cache-cut

Used Apache 2.0 licensed libraries:
butterknife - Jake Wharton (https://github.com/JakeWharton/butterknife)
ub0rlogg0r - Felix Bechstein (https://github.com/felixb/ub0rlogg0r)
